comments:
I used the update manager to upgrade from AJDT 1.1.1 to 1.1.2 in Eclipse 2.1. 
When it starts up it says there was an error in initializing the workspace and 
the Error Log includes the following two errors. Attempts to build an AspectJ 
project also fail:

This turned out to be a jdt bug. See the following answer to my append on the 
jdt-dev list.

Adrian,

I assume you run on 2.1. This bug 36554 has been fixed in the 3.0 and the
2.1 maintenance stream.

HTH
Dani

traces.message: Problems encountered starting up plug- in: "org.eclipse.jdt.ui".
